description: This file defines a mock class HdmiInputImplMock for testing purposes, which mocks the interface device::HdmiInputImpl related to HDMI input functionalities.

classes.name: HdmiInputImplMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing the HdmiInputImpl interface for unit testing HDMI input functionalities.

methods.name: ~HdmiInputImplMock
methods.description: Destructor for the mock class, defaulted.

methods.name: getNumberOfInputs
methods.description: Mocks the method retrieving the number of HDMI inputs.

methods.name: isPortConnected
methods.description: Mocks the method checking port connection status.

methods.name: getCurrentVideoMode
methods.description: Mocks the method retrieving current video mode.

methods.name: selectPort
methods.description: Mocks the method for selecting an HDMI port with specific settings.

methods.name: scaleVideo
methods.description: Mocks the method to scale the video display.

methods.name: getEDIDBytesInfo
methods.description: Mocks the method fetching EDID bytes information.

methods.name: getHDMISPDInfo
methods.description: Mocks the method fetching HDMI SPD info.

methods.name: setEdidVersion
methods.description: Mocks the method setting EDID version.

methods.name: getEdidVersion
methods.description: Mocks the method retrieving EDID version.

methods.name: setEdid2AllmSupport
methods.description: Mocks the method setting support for ambient lighting management in EDID.

methods.name: getEdid2AllmSupport
methods.description: Mocks the method retrieving support status for EDID2 Allm.

methods.name: setVRRSupport
methods.description: Mocks the method to set VRR support.

methods.name: getVRRSupport
methods.description: Mocks the method to get VRR support status.

methods.name: getHdmiALLMStatus
methods.description: Mocks the method fetching HDMI ALLM status.

methods.name: getVRRStatus
methods.description: Mocks the method fetching VRR status.

methods.name: getSupportedGameFeatures
methods.description: Mocks the method retrieving supported game features.

methods.name: getAVLatency
methods.description: Mocks the method retrieving audio/video latency info.

methods.name: getCurrentVideoModeObj
methods.description: Mocks the method retrieving current video mode object.

methods.name: getHdmiVersion
methods.description: Mocks the method retrieving HDMI maximum capability version.

methods.name: getHDMIARCPortId
methods.description: Mocks the method retrieving HDMI ARC port ID.
